name: The Lands of Urek
description:
These are the lands of Urek, a cold and arid place in the northern reaches of the known world. Here lives the nomad giant folk of Dunar, descendants of the now-forgotten titans that once ruled this huge territory. In the Muraz citadel down south lives a hideous, but gentle curious people.

Estas são as terras de Urek, um lugar frio e árido no extremo norte do mundo conhecido. Aqui vive o povo nômade gigante de Dunar, descendentes dos agora esquecidos titãs que governaram este enorme território. Na cidadela de Muraz, no sul, vive um povo curioso, medonho, mas gentil.

Age of Gods — https://horoscopezine.itch.io/age-of-gods

MSX — https://horoscopezine.itch.io/msx-english

Rush — https://horoscopezine.itch.io/rush
